name: The Last of Stardew Valley
description: The Last of Stardew Valley was created for my first game creation assignment at Brunel University and was a mash-up of my two favourite games at the time: The Last of Us, and Stardew Valley. This game is a top-down zombie survival game that incorporates a hard-hitting storyline, weapon crafting, resource management and scavenging. This short prototype was created within Clickteam Fusion and is an admirable outcome of my first attempt at using the software. The assets were taken and modified from The Spriters Resource. Reference list available on request.
